评论概述: Comfy and casual dressy.  I will wear this to many places. I love it.
评论详情: Loved the material and construction was excellent.
I like the way it fits.

This is the perfect outfit for lounging around the house or running errands. It's so comfortable and easy to wear. It's actually really flattering for a sweatsuit. Fit is true to size. I wear it all the time at home.
I wish I had ordered a medium for a better fit. It fits in small, the material is comfy and the style is as pictured. I just wish it was roomier.
Good quality, true to size, well priced

评论概述: Soft Material, Looks & Fits Great, Warm!
评论详情: Great pair of sweatpants. Very comfortable and great for lounging around. Love for colder days.

I ordered this set as it is the colors of my college alma matter and I could see myself wearing this for football weekends! It is TTS and so dang cute! I haven't really seen anything similar and so I'm very excited that I found this! Its so comfortable and I see myself wearing this over and over when the weather gets cooler!

Vine reviewer here giving you my honest hands-on review and inspection of the product you are considering.  I thought this looked kind of retro and thought I'd get it for 80s Day at school. It might have worked, I just wish it was brighter. However it is way too small. I wear a 10, I probably should have got an XL if I wanted a much baggier look. A large may (may) have been okay, but the idea of showing off my cellulite does not bode well with me.  The fabric is very thin polyester. However, if it's for working out, it won't breathe at all. The pants are tight on me and they show every little bump. This is not forgiving fabric. If you size up, maybe being looser will help. But wherever the fabric touches your skin, it will show detail: muffin tops, bra lines, and cellulite... every bit of it.  The track suit is well made but it's not high end clothing. It's overlocked throughout. No pockets. The ribbing on the sleeves, waistband, and ankles feels a little loose as it is not tightly ribbed. This may be a good thing; it allows for the leg to drop to the bottom of the ankle and not bunch up at the ankle and stay there (my kids call these sausage pants because of that). But it might stretch more as time goes by and get very loose.  I am going to either gift this to my elderly mother or youngest daughter. I think it's ironic, one will wear it because it looks like old lady clothes (my mother is in her 80s), the other because is trendy. But at least it will get worn, just not by me :)

The Zayoit Women's 2 Piece Outfits Lounge Sets in Pink offer a stylish and comfortable ensemble perfect for active wear or casual lounging. This matching sweat suit features a zippered long sleeve sweatshirt and coordinating sweatpants, designed for both fashion and functionality.  Crafted from soft and breathable fabric, the lounge set provides a cozy and relaxed fit that allows for ease of movement throughout the day. The sweatshirt features a zipper closure and long sleeves, while the sweatpants come with an elastic waistband and cuffs, ensuring a comfortable and secure fit.  Ideal for various activities such as yoga, workouts, or simply lounging at home, the set combines practicality with a trendy aesthetic. The pink color adds a cheerful and feminine touch, making it a versatile choice for both indoor and outdoor wear.  Whether worn as a complete outfit or mixed and matched with other wardrobe staples, the Zayoit Women's 2 Piece Lounge Sets offer versatility and style. They're a perfect blend of comfort and fashion, catering to women who appreciate chic and functional activewear for everyday use.

评论概述: Wish it was Softer & Better Fit
评论详情: The first thing to notice is the 96% Polyester, 4% Elastane which gives the top plenty of stretch but not to where it looks slouchy. Will work for this coming winter, keeping me warm on those cold days. I wouldn't wear it for spring or summer. The waist band on the shirt has a nice ribbing to it and not binding. The cuffs on the sleeves have plenty of stretch to it. The waist band on the pants have elastic & a drawstring. The elastic isn't overly tight just enough to hold them up and remain comfortable. But the pants didn't fit nearly as well as the top. It was more snug and I don't have much of a bum or hips. They felt like it was a size smaller compared to the top. The length on the pants was fine. I will wear them at home but doubt I that I'll wear them in public.
Comfortable like the material lightweight
Got this set for my wife, she likes it alot for house lounging. The fabric is nice, not excellent. She would prefer it a little thinner. Like all of the available colors.

评论概述: Does not seem breathable as they state
评论详情: The outfit fit me alright, I ordered a medium according to size charge.  Could of ordered a small, but it is a causal jogging suit, so it is fine.  The material reminds me of the  polyester of the 70's, along with the style. Cannot say I am a huge fan of this jogging suit. Would not order it again.

评论概述: Zayoit Women's 2 Piece Outfits Lounge Sets
评论详情: I am not as wild about this outfit as I thought I would be? It seems to be well constructed but the fact that it is lined with a silky liner just does not suit my personal taste.

Cute basic track outfit for women. True to size, just wished the color block was a little better. The outfit is more designed for fall/winter as opposed to spring/summer track outfit. The material is nice. Recommend to anyone who needs it.

评论概述: Pretty Colors! Comfortable! Pants Have Pockets! RUNS SMALL! Heavier Fabric!
评论详情: Current price $39.99. Size Large - Cream/Pink. I'm 5'6" and 130 lbs. I normally wear a size medium but based on the measurements I went with the large. I am really happy that I ordered the large, the waist measures 28 inches, the inseam is 29 inches, hips measure 40 inches, and the chest measures 44 inches. The pants measure more like a size medium. The size of the outfit measures pretty much like the size chart but the pants are a bit smaller. The fabric is polyester and is a bit heavier fabric, more suited to cooler days. Very comfortable to wear! 4 Stars. Hope you find this review and pictures helpful! The color is very pretty. Nice zipper - pulls easily. Really nice leisure set! Pants have pockets!

Comfy, cute, and true to size fit! Great as a casual outfit or gym wear. Easy to move in and the pullover is light, but warm. Washes well in the washer. Well stitched with no loose threads or fraying. Really love wearing this out and about to run errands! 5/5
Nice two piece track suit, nice quality, cute design. Material is nice and comfortable.

This 2-piece women's suit is made of lightweight, breathable, and comfortable fabric with a classic color-clashing design suitable for many occasions. It's perfect for year-round lounging or activewear. The high-waisted sweatpants have a delicate elastic waistband and drawstring, providing comfort and two pockets for small item storage. The half zip V-neck long sleeve sweatshirt design of the loungewear top adds a fashionable touch, and the vertical collar keeps you warm. This outfit is comfortable, non-clingy, and feels almost like pajamas. It's perfect for traveling! I wore it with white sneakers and a denim jacket, receiving many compliments. I can confirm it doesn't shrink after washing and is stylish for a casual, comfortable look. I would definitely buy it again!
This fits true to size and is very comfortable.  Love the color block design.  Perfect for staying warm in Spring and Fall.

This is a very well made, true to size outfit.  I love this for plane rides where you need to be comfortable and warm while also looking cute. It's a medium weight material. The elastic bottoms are nice to allow for various heights without needing alteration. Looks and feels classy.

评论概述: Comfortable wear for spring or fall
评论详情: I really like how this looks and feels, ordering clothes online is always a gamble but this pair turned out quite nice. It's the right thickness and warmth for spring or fall, any milder weather and while made of mostly polyester, is fairly comfortable, it does not have the scratchy texture some online clothing has. It fits well, I like the pants are not too loose, these would make good workout or jogging outfits. If you're a medium size most of the time, medium is not loose but should work, I find it comfortable. And the colors and look is good. Quite pleased with this pair

Ordered a medium, my usual size. The top fit perfect. The pants are just odd. They were very tight in the thighs and butt. Very long. And the waist was fine. Just not a comfortable fit for me at all. The material is a heavy thick polyester. There is no fleecy material on the inside. For reference I’m 5’8” 145#

I absolutely love this two-piece set it fits my body like a glove.  I like the fabric it's very soft and comfortable.  The construction of the sweat suit is done well I like the style design and the colors that are used. I'm extremely happy.
They fit perfectly, look wonderful, and are very comfortable. Highly recommend!

Fits my 14 year old daughter perfectly. She loves it, particularly the deep green. She's taking it camping this weekend although we are worried the white will stain. It's a warm day here so trying it on she got hot immediately, but it will be perfect in the cool evenings to help keep away the bugs.

Amazon recommended a large but I got the medium, Im glad I did. This set runs a lityle big. I think a large would have swallowed me up. Im 5'3 127 lbs and the medium is oretty close to perfect. The pants length is good, not short. Love the pockets. And the zipoer on the top. The two tone color block is stylish and the material is so soft. I would recommend.

If you want to look stylish and be comfortable this is the sweat suit for you! The material used is very breathable and comfortable, the colors are beautiful I got the pink one and highly recommend this jogger lounge set

评论概述: Order the size up for this item
评论详情: I love the design reminds me of the 70 and early 80. Material is synthetic. Great design and color blocks. The caveat is that the size is wrong. It means if you are a small size order Medium and so on. The size is not correct.
